name: Shadow Trail
description:
The game is still at an early development, expect for a few contents ingame.

Warning: might contain some mature content.

The town has been in harmony for years, until one night that darkness has befallen the peace. Monsters have been appearing, and the witches which was once quiet, had become hostile.

You will play as a young witch on a quest to find out why your sisters have suddenly become very wicked. Roam around, visit strange places, and destroy evil creatures that comes up your way.

Patreon page: https://www.patreon.com/ShadowTrail
